name: Blaster Rifle (V)
Lore: 'Stormtrooper BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Can convert from a pistol to a rifle configuration by using extendable stock. Carries 100 shots. Military issue only.',
Text: 'Deploy on your Imperial warrior; warrior is power +1. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny; add 1 if targeting a character, 2 if a vehicle. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if total destiny > defense value.',
